title: 遊戲打不開 錯誤訊息missing `server' JVM
author: zxc2527166
txt_content:
我下载了论坛上的服务端整合包这个https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-892493-1-1.html
我點点启动.bat
跳错误讯息
Error: missing `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.8.0_231\bin\server\jvm.dll'.
Please install or use the JRE or JDK that contains these missing components.
我正版乾净的游戏可以正常启动

java应该没问题阿

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
尝试重装 java ，正版启动器是内置了一个 java 的。

https://javadl.oracle.com/webapp ... bf28bcb45c792fce896
